alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia; Franklin; Madison; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued November 30 at 12:52AM CST until November 30 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 575 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 2 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA CATAHOULA CONCORDIA FRANKLIN MADISON TENSAS IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 23 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ATTALA COPIAH HINDS HOLMES LEAKE MADISON RANKIN SCOTT SIMPSON YAZOO IN EAST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI KEMPER NESHOBA NEWTON NOXUBEE WINSTON IN SOUTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI JEFFERSON DAVIS LAWRENCE LINCOLN IN SOUTHWEST MISSISSIPPI ADAMS CLAIBORNE FRANKLIN JEFFERSON IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BASSFIELD, BRANDON, BROOKHAVEN, BROOKSVILLE, BUDE, CANTON, CARTHAGE, CONEHATTA, CRYSTAL SPRINGS, DE KALB, DECATUR, DURANT, FAYETTE, FERRIDAY, FOREST, GOODMAN, HARRISONBURG, HAZLEHURST, JACKSON, JONESVILLE, KOSCIUSKO, LEXINGTON, LOUISVILLE, MACON, MADISON, MAGEE, MEADVILLE, MENDENHALL, MONTICELLO, MORTON, NATCHEZ, NEW HEBRON, NEWELLTON, NEWTON, PEARL, PEARL RIVER, PHILADELPHIA, PICKENS, PORT GIBSON, PRENTISS, RICHLAND, RIDGELAND, ROXIE, SCOOBA, ST. JOSEPH, TALLULAH, TCHULA, UNION, VICKSBURG, VIDALIA, WATERPROOF, WESSON, WEST FERRIDAY, WINNSBORO, AND YAZOO CITY.
